name: Mongo Transporter
description: Sync data between two MongoDB deployments.

SOURCE_MONGO_URL.description: The full connection string of the MongoDB deployment you want to sync from.

SOURCE_DB.description: The DB name to sync from. eg. prod_db

SINK_MONGO_URL.description: The full connection string of the MongoDB deployment you want to sync to.

SINK_DB.description: The DB name sync to. eg. staging_db

TAIL.description: Specify true to enable oplog tailing or false for one-time sync.

DEBUG.description: Specify true to enable verbose logging to stdout for debugging purposes.
